code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./HospitalList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HospitalList=()=>{const[hospitals,setHospitals]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:8080/admin/hospitals',{headers:{'Authorization':'Basic YWRtaW4xMjM6Y21z'}}).then(response=>{setHospitals(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error('There was an error fetching the hospitals!',error);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"outershell",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hospital-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Paperless Healthcare Providers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Discover a list of hospitals within the Mediclaim network that offer cashless and paperless treatment options, ensuring a smooth and efficient healthcare experience.Enjoy the benefits of immediate access to care while eliminating the hassle of upfront payments and paperwork"}),hospitals.map(hospital=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hospital-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hospital-name",children:hospital.hospitalName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hospital-address",children:hospital.address})]},hospital.id))]})});};export default HospitalList;
